name: Jiji Mago: Old & Young RPG mini
summary:
JIJImago(old & young)RPGmini is a short JRPG game made in Wolf RPG Editor. Created with retro four-color ascetics, JIJImago follows the adventure of an old man (Jii-san) and a young girl (Mago),

While this game is the third in the series, it can be played independently.
